item.title: 美国贿赂指控后，熊市可能加倍下注阿达尼集团股票
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 阿美石油公司首席财务官表示将承担更多债务，专注于股利增长
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯石油公司（Saudi Arabian Oil Co.【原文：Saudi Arabian Oil Co. plans to take on more debt and will focus on “value and growth” for its dividend, the company’s finance chief said.】

item.title: 日本 NHK 称石原慎太郎将宣布 1400 亿美元刺激计划
item.description: 据公共广播公司 NHK 报道，日本首相石破茂将公布一项 21.9 万亿日元（约合 1,400 亿美元）的经济刺激计划，以应对从通货膨胀到工资增长等一系列挑战。【原文：Japanese Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba is set to unveil a ¥21.9 trillion ($140 billion) economic stimulus package to address a range of challenges from inflation to wage growth, according to public broadcaster NHK.】

item.title: 创始人遭美国当局指控后阿达尼债券暴跌
item.description: 在美国检察官指控阿达尼集团创始人高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）涉嫌参与贿赂阴谋后，阿达尼集团发行的美元纸币周四下跌了10美分。【原文：Dollar-denominated notes issued by the Adani Group fell as much as 10 cents on the dollar Thursday after US prosecutors charged Gautam Adani, the group founder with participating in an alleged bribe plot.】

item.title: 比特币濒临 95,000 美元，加密货币寻求直面特朗普
item.description: 比特币即将触及 95000 美元，数字资产行业正通过推动在白宫新设一个专门负责加密货币政策的职位来巩固其在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）心目中的影响力。【原文：Bitcoin is on the cusp of hitting $95,000 as the digital-asset sector moves to cement its influence with Donald Trump by pushing for a new White House post dedicated to cryptocurrency policy.】

item.title: 埃隆-马斯克的 Neuralink 公司获准在加拿大开始大脑芯片试验
item.description:
这位亿万富翁的脑设备公司目前正在美国、英国和加拿大招募患者。【原文：

The billionaire’s brain device company is currently recruiting patients in the US, UK and Canada.

】

item.title: 拜朱被指控试图用丢失的贷款现金收购公司
item.description: 据一份新的法庭文件显示，印度破产科技公司 Byju's 的创始人试图利用他被指控向美国贷款人隐瞒的贷款收益，秘密回购一家被美国托管人接管的软件公司。【原文：The founder of bankrupt Indian tech firm Byju’s tried to use loan proceeds that he allegedly hid from US lenders to secretly buy back a software company that was taken over by an American trustee, according to a new court filing.】

item.title: Blackstone 向 Lancium AI 建设投资 5 亿美元
item.description: 据熟悉此事的人士透露，Blackstone Inc. 向 Lancium Inc. 投资了超过 5 亿美元，该公司正在德克萨斯州西部建设超过 5 千兆瓦的数据中心，着眼于为人工智能应用提供蓬勃发展的能源需求。【原文：Blackstone Inc. invested more than $500 million in Lancium Inc., which is building more than 5 gigawatts of data centers in West Texas with an eye on supplying the booming energy demand for artificial intelligence applications, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 百度牛市退却，财报凸显公司面临的人工智能挑战
item.description: 在百度公司公布第三季度财报之前，市场对该公司在美国上市的股票的乐观情绪正在减弱，因为交易员们正在讨论这家搜索引擎公司在人工智能方面的努力是否会带来回报。【原文：Optimism about Baidu Inc.’s US-listed shares is waning ahead of the company’s third-quarter results, as traders debate whether the search engine’s artificial intelligence efforts will pay off.】

item.title: 印尼将评估苹果为终止 iPhone 16 禁售令而提出的 1 亿美元申请
item.description: 印度尼西亚将对苹果公司提出的 1 亿美元投资建议进行评估，这家美国科技巨头正试图说服政府解除对 iPhone 16 的销售禁令。【原文：Indonesia is set to assess a $100 million investment proposal from Apple Inc., as the American tech giant attempts to coax the government to unblock its sales ban on the iPhone 16.】

item.title: Beyond 质疑计划 4000 万美元入股 The Container Store
item.description: Beyond Inc. 周三发表声明称，该公司担心 The Container Store Group Inc.【原文：Beyond Inc. has concerns about The Container Store Group Inc.’s ability to satisfy certain new financing requirements needed to complete its $40 million investment in the company, according to a statement on Wednesday.】

item.title: 英国让家庭更容易安装电热泵
item.description: 英国正在加大对电热泵的支持力度，这是一项关键技术，可减少该国冬季家庭取暖对天然气的依赖。【原文：The UK is ramping up support for electric heat pumps, a key technology to cut the country’s dependence on natural gas to keep homes warm during winter.】

item.title: 韩国早期出口数据显示恢复增长
item.description: 韩国的早期贸易数据显示，11 月份出口恢复增长，这对韩国经济来说是一个积极的信号，因为人们对美国新政府上台后的全球贸易前景越来越担忧。【原文：South Korea’s early trade figures showed exports returning to growth in November in a positive sign for the economy amid mounting concern over the outlook for global commerce with a new US administration.】

item.title: 美国原油库存连续第三周增加，石油价格保持稳定
item.description: 随着美国原油库存连续第三周增加，石油价格趋于稳定，交易商正在关注乌克兰战争的升级。【原文：Oil steadied as US crude stockpiles expanded for a third week, with traders monitoring an escalation of the war in Ukraine.】

item.title: 阿达尼公司在亿万富翁被起诉前数小时出售债券
item.description: 在美国检察官指控高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）参与贿赂计划的几小时前，这位亿万富翁的企业集团旗下的一个部门在美国企业债券市场上发行了 6 亿美元的债券，超额认购超过三倍。【原文：Hours before US prosecutors charged Gautam Adani with participating in a bribery scheme, a unit of the billionaire’s conglomerate tapped the US corporate bond market for a $600 million offering that was more than three times oversubscribed.】

item.title: 菲律宾农作物绝收，风暴拦河坝威胁菲律宾经济增长
item.description: 雨季后期的六场强风暴肆虐农作物，菲律宾大片地区被淋成了落汤鸡，导致该国大米进口量创下历史新高，并引发了对粮食通胀上升的担忧。【原文：Six powerful storms late in the season that ravaged crops and drenched vast areas of the Philippines have put the nation on track for record rice imports and raised concerns over elevated food inflation.】

item.title: 英伟达未能给人留下深刻印象，亚洲股市将下滑：市场综述
item.description: 亚洲股市早盘注定下跌，反映了华尔街因英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.国债收益率和美元上涨，而比特币则创下了新纪录。【原文：Asian equities were set for early declines, reflecting a muted mood on Wall Street that was amplified by Nvidia Corp.’s lackluster revenue forecast. Treasury yields and the dollar rose, while Bitcoin set a fresh record.】

item.title: 美国国家安全局局长希望业界披露电信黑客攻击细节
item.description: 美国国家安全局局长周三敦促私营部门迅速采取集体行动，分享他们遭受中国黑客入侵美国电信的关键细节。【原文：The director of the National Security Agency on Wednesday urged the private sector to take swift, collective action to share key details about breaches they have suffered at the hands of Chinese hackers who have infiltrated US telecommunications.】

item.title: 盖茨的性不端行为报告发布受众议院共和党阻挠
item.description: 众议院道德委员会的共和党人周三投票表决，决定对当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）挑选的司法部长人选马特-盖茨（Matt Gaetz）的性行为不端调查结果保密。【原文：Republicans on the House Ethics Committee voted Wednesday to keep confidential its findings on the sexual misconduct probe into Matt Gaetz, President-elect Donald Trump’s pick for attorney general, the panel’s top Democrat said.】

item.title: 新西兰财政部认为更严重的经济衰退对税收造成压力
item.description: 据财政部称，新西兰经济下滑的程度超出了预期，这给税收收入带来了压力，因为政府正在努力减少预算赤字。【原文：New Zealand’s economic downturn has been deeper than expected, putting pressure on tax revenues as the government struggles to reduce its budget deficit, according to the Treasury Department.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）称埃及项目审查会谈将在取得 "进展 "后继续进行
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）表示，该组织与埃及就该北非国家 80 亿美元计划的最新审查进行的讨论取得了 "实质性进展"，但仍需进一步会谈。【原文：The International Monetary Fund said it made “substantial progress” in discussions with Egypt on the latest review of the North Africa nation’s $8 billion program, although further talks are needed.】

item.title: 针对液化天然气出口商 Venture Global 的仲裁索赔接近 60 亿美元
item.description: 根据彭博社看到的一份债券文件，液化天然气出口商 Venture Global LNG Inc.【原文：Pending arbitration claims against liquefied natural gas exporter Venture Global LNG Inc. from several of its customers have grown to nearly $6 billion, according to a bond document seen by Bloomberg.】

item.title: 英伟达预测人工智能明星未达最乐观预期
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.）发布的营收预测未能达到最高预期，这表明该公司在人工智能推动下令人眼花缭乱的增长势头也有其局限性。【原文：Nvidia Corp. delivered a revenue forecast that failed to meet the highest expectations, showing that its dizzying AI-fueled growth run has its limits.】

item.title: 雪花公司因产品销售增长前景强劲而股价大涨
item.description: Snowflake Inc. 在盘后交易中上涨，此前该公司发布了好于预期的销售展望，表明新推出的产品受到了客户的欢迎。【原文：Snowflake Inc. gained in extended trading after the company gave a better-than-expected sales outlook, suggesting newly launched products are receiving a strong reception from customers.】

item.title: 2025 年香港、新加坡和澳大利亚的房价将上涨
item.description: 据彭博情报公司（Bloomberg Intelligence）称，亚洲主要市场的房地产价格预计将在明年上涨，其中香港的涨幅将居首位。【原文：Property prices in Asia’s major markets are expected to rise over the next year with Hong Kong leading the projected gains, according to Bloomberg Intelligence.】

item.title: 对冲基金 Effissimo 持股日产引发猜测
item.description: Effissimo Capital Management Pte 对日产汽车公司的最终目标是什么？【原文：What is Effissimo Capital Management Pte’s end game for Nissan Motor Co.?】

item.title: 美联储主席柯林斯称需要更多宽松政策，最终目的地尚不明确
item.description: 波士顿联邦储备银行行长苏珊-柯林斯（Susan Collins）表示，需要更多的降息措施，但决策者应谨慎行事，避免行动过快或过慢。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Boston President Susan Collins said more interest-rate cuts are needed, but policymakers should proceed carefully to avoid moving too quickly or too slowly.】

item.title: 日本工会负责人呼吁石破加大涨薪力度
item.description: 日本最大的工会负责人呼吁首相石破茂领导的政府加快努力提高工资，尤其是小企业工人的工资，因为他们希望明年的工资谈判能取得更好的结果。【原文：Japan’s largest labor union chief is calling for Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba’s government to accelerate efforts to boost wages, especially for workers at small firms, as they seek to achieve stronger results for next year’s pay negotiations.】

item.title: Anthropic 首席执行官称需要对人工智能模型进行强制性安全测试
item.description: Anthropic公司首席执行官达里奥-阿莫代（Dario Amodei）说，包括他自己的公司在内的人工智能公司应该接受强制性测试要求，以确保其技术在发布之前对公众是安全的。【原文：Anthropic Chief Executive Officer Dario Amodei said artificial intelligence companies, including his own, should be subject to mandatory testing requirements to ensure their technologies are safe for the public before release.】

item.title: 美国 IPO 候选企业瞄准感恩节后短暂的上市窗口期
item.description: 美国人在感恩节大快朵颐之后，美国的银行家们预计，投资者们将在今年公司首次公开募股的最后空窗期，大吃一顿规模可观的首次公开募股。【原文：After Americans feast on Thanksgiving, the country’s bankers expect investors will devour sizable initial public offerings stuffed into the final window of the year for company debuts.】
